title: If the elements comprising the world lack life in their essences, how can life surge forth from them? - Quora

response.answer_text: Neither hydrogen nor oxygen are wet - but water is. No water molecule has a six fold symmetry - but snowflakes do. No snowflake could move rocks and trees - but an avalanche will. These things are called “emergent properties". Life and consciousness may be the same.
Each and every minute amount of matter,all of them are part and parcel of this universe.
This is why some believe the origin of life is extra-terrestrial.
